channel.title: rC3 – Content Moderation - AMA!
channel.description:
[date=2020-12-28 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]
Hi, I am Derek Caelin, an Innovation and Data Specialist at Counterpart International (CPI) with experience in open source technology and social media. I've helped activists deploy technology for social good at CPI, PeaceTech Lab, and the United States Institute of Peace.
Recently I spoke with 80 people, primarily on Mastodon, including 12 interviews of Fediverse administrators and moderators as well as hate speech monitors and experts in dangerous speech. I have also conducted a survey of Fediverse users with 670 respondents.
# Ask Me Anything!
# [Join via jitsi](https://meet.jit.si/ScatteredConsequencesActRegardless) --- If you don't have a ticket, you can ask you questions by sending a post in the fediverse to [@activitypub@gup.pe](https://gup.pe/u/activitypub) or in IRC #social on freenode …
**Please note if the 2D world does work:** Plan B is to do it stabil at https://meet.jit.si/ScatteredConsequencesActRegardless

item.description:
Hey Everybody! A quick update, I’ve joined the fine folks at Tech Matters, making software for social good and supporting the social good open source tech community. Still fascinated by online communities, still hoping we can all find a way to use tech in a way that helps bring us together and doesn’t hurt us.

The video @Sebastian referenced is here - hope you enjoy.

Please connect with me on Mastodon..
